quotes.quote: The wise man will love; all others will desire.
quotes.author: Afranius

quotes.quote: One must not lose desires. They are mighty stimulants to creativeness, to love, and to long life.
quotes.author: Alexander A. Bogomoletz

quotes.quote: Man is an animal which, alone among the animals, refuses to be satisfied by the fulfilment of animal desires.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Dwell not upon thy weariness, thy strength shall be according to the measure of thy desire.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Again, men in general desire the good, and not merely what their fathers had.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who overcomes his enemies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is the nature of desire not to be satisfied, and most men live only for the gratification of it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: How helpless we are, like netted birds, when we are caught by desire!
quotes.author: Belva Plain

quotes.quote: If you greatly desire something, have the guts to stake everything on obtaining it.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: In men of the highest character and noblest genius there is to be found an insatiable desire for honour, command, power, and glory.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote:
Let your desires be ruled by reason.
(Appetitus Rationi Pareat)
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: He who desires is always poor.
quotes.author: Claudianus

quotes.quote: While we don't have much say over the desires that we have, we certainly can decide which we prefer-and then search for ways to act on that basis.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is not to get your heart's desire. The other is to get it.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: If we desire to avoid insult, we must be able to repel it; if we desire to secure peace, one of the most powerful instruments of our rising prosperity, it must be known, that we are at all times ready for War.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: Man is the only animal whose desires increase as they are fed; the only animal that is never satisfied.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu

quotes.quote:
Manifest plainness,
Embrace simplicity,
Reduce selfishness,
Have few desires.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu

quotes.quote:
There is no calamity greater than lavish desires.
There is no greater guilt than discontentment.
And there is no greater disaster than greed.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Some prices are just too high, no matter how much you may want the prize. The one thing you can't trade for your heart's desire is your heart.
quotes.author: Margaret Deland

quotes.quote: One must desire something to be alive.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A human being has a natural desire to have more of a good thing than he needs.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: We desire nothing so much as what we ought not to have.
quotes.author: Raymond Holliwell

quotes.quote: Desire creates the power.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Life ought to be a struggle of desire toward adventures whose nobility will fertilize the soul.
quotes.author: Stanley Kunitz

quotes.quote: What makes the engine go? Desire, desire, desire.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Those who restrain desire, do so because theirs is weak enough to be restrained.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
Every man has business and desire,
Such as it is.
